document: <sentence id="s1" text="The purpose of this study was to explore the use of iterative decomposition of water and positive regulation of cell-matrix adhesion with echo asymmetry and least-squares estimation Carr-Purcell-Meiboom-Gill (IDEAL-CPMG) to simultaneously measure skeletal muscle apparent fat fraction and water T2 (T2,w) in patients with Duchenne muscular dystrophy (peptide biosynthetic process).">
